verses.content: “Tuhin ko ta; nanga hung dawn che an um hrim am? Mi inthieng a tu tieng am a na i nghakîr ding?
Lunginsenna chun mi invêt chu a sukhlumin, Îtthîkna chun mi intlâw chu a that hlak sih a.
Mi invêt zungkei chu ka hmu tah a; Nisienlakhawm, a umna chu ṭawngsie kân phur nghâl hlak.
A thlahai chu himnaa inthawka hlatakah an um a, Dâi kawtkhâr bula chun râwtdein an um a; Anni sansuok dingin tukhawm an um bawk nawh.
A lohmasuok chu phîngṭâm chun a fâk zo a, Hlinghai laia mi khawm chu a lâk suok hlak a; A thil neihai dingin châng chu ân kam zing hlak.
Tuorna hi pilvut laia inthawkin a hung suok ngai si nawh a; Buoina khawm hi leihnuoia inthawkin a hung mâwng suok ngai bawk nawh;
Amiruokchu, mihriem chu buoinaa hung pieng a ni lem, Meisihai chungtienga a vuong ang elin.
“Ka chungthua chun Pathien tieng zawng ka ta, Pathien kuomah ka chungthu chu inkawltir ka tih.
Thil ropuitakhai le zawng suok ruol lohai chu thawh a; Thil maktakhai tiem sêng lo thawtu chu.
Ama chun hnuoi chungah ruo a hung pêk a; Loahai chun tuihai chu a hung tir bawk a:
Mi inhnuoihai chu a dawm sâng a; Thlainvaihai chu himnaah a sie kai hlak.
Themthiem remruotnahai chu a sukthlâwn a, Chuongchun, an kuthai chun an nuom zâwng chu a puitlin thei nawh.
Mi varhai chu an var vervêknain a âwk a; Mi vervêkhai inrâwnna chu a letlingin a siem hlak.
Sûn huna chun inthimna leh an intuok a, Sûnchang lai zâna ang elin an inmai hlak.
An baua kâwlhnâma inthawk chu fahrahai a sanhim a, Mi tlasamhai chu mi hrât kuta inthawkin a sansuok hlak.
Chuongchun, mi rimsi chun beiseina a hung nei a, Rîtlona chun a bau ân chîp tah a.
“Ngai ta, mi Pathienin a sukdik chu a va hlim de! Chuleiin, Iengkimthawthei thununna chu hmusit naw rawh.
Pânna a siem a, a tuom a, A sukhliem a, a kuthai chun a sukdam sih a.
Buoina paruka inthawkin sansuok a ti cheh a, Anih, pasaria thil ṭha naw hrimin nang tâwk ta naw ni che.
Ṭâm lai chun thinaa inthawkin sansuok a ti che a; Indo lai chun kâwlhnâm thilthawtheinaa inthawkin sansuok a ti che.
Lei hrilsietnaa inthawk chun thuphmang nîng i ta; Sukbohmangna a hung tlung pha khawm ṭi bawk naw ti nih.
Sukbohmangnaa le ṭâmnaa chun innui i ta, Hnuoi chunga sahrânghai khawm ṭi bawk naw ti nih.
Rama lunghai le chun inthuruol tâng in ta; Rama sahrânghai khawm chu nang le inremin um tâng an tih.
Chun, i puon in chu a râlmuong ti hrieng i ta; I ran in chu va sir i ta, iengkhawm inhmang naw nih.
I chithla chu a hung ropui ding a nih ti hre bawk i ta; I thlahai chu hnuoi chunga hlobet ang elin.
Kum tling zetin thlâna chun fêng i ta; Buvûi kuong chu a hun taka hrizâwla a hung um angin.
En ta hi, ei zawng suok ta hi, a lo ni ngei a nih; Ngai la, i ṭhatna dingin hung hre rawh,” tiin.
